channel.title: Lighshows
channel.description:
I'm sure you guys have noticed the ads all over the last few days for the website called emazing lights.
i recently bought gloves (3 weeks ago, maybe not "recent") but from a different site named liquid emotions (i used them instead because the owner is a fucking idiot and i tricked him into giving me 5 extra dropz)
anybody else into raves/light shows?

item.title: Lighshows
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:5, topic:386797”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=482567.msg3534074#msg3534074 date=1300415570]
Looks interesting I suppose, this is something I’ve never heard of doing. Though, I would think that this gets boring after at least like a minute (watching them).
[/quote]depends how interested you get into it.

once you get good and have music going along, you can make some fun routines to watch.[/quote]
Alright, I will look into this a little more, as far as looking at some more videos.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:386797”]Hadn’t seen the ads, but I looked it up. I don’t see what it’s all about? Gloves with lights on them?[/quote]here this is my friend jack


if he gets 1k views he gets sponsored so i’m just trying to help him out

but what it is, is if your on e (exstecy… idk how to spell it) it looks REALLY fucking amazing.
you trip balls.
but i do it just because it looks cool even not on e.
